arts.ttl: Lionel Messi confronts James Rodriguez in tense exchange during Argentina vs Colombia
arts.sum: Messi and Rodriguez engaged in a war of words reportedly over recent comments on the 2024 Copa America final

arts.ttl: What Lionel Messi Said to James Rodriguez During Heated Argentina vs Colombia Clash
arts.sum: Lionel Messi and James Rodriguez were involved in a tense conversation during the World Cup qualifier between Argentina and Colombia.

arts.ttl: Enzo sent off as Argentina rally for Colombia draw
arts.sum: Argentina rescued a 1-1 draw at home to Colombia in the Conmebol World Cup qualifiers on Tuesday night, after Liverpool's Luis Díaz scored a sensational individual goal to stun the world champions.

arts.ttl: Argentina 1-1 Colombia: Player Ratings As Thiago Almada Rescues La Albiceleste
arts.sum: The first-half goal from Luis Diaz, though, will live on in the memories of Colombia’s World Cup qualifying campaign, despite it coming in the eventual 1–1 draw. Thiago Almada scored the 1–1 goal in the 81st minute, bringing La Albiceleste level after falling behind 1-0 in the first half, and further going down a man when Enzo Fernandez was sent off on a red card in the 71st minute.

arts.ttl: Argentina vs. Colombia: Head-to-head record and past meetings
arts.sum: Ahead of Tuesday's World Cup qualifying match between Argentina and Colombia, Sports Mole looks at the head-to-head record and previous meetings between the two nations.

arts.ttl: Will Messi start? Predicted Argentina lineup vs. Colombia
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Argentina could line up against Colombia.

arts.ttl: Argentina vs Colombia - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Wednesday's World Cup Qualifying - South America clash between Argentina and Colombia, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
